data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Pune, Maharashtra, India.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pune, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 9,211,267 who are far from you in Pune, Maharashtra, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Pune.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Pune, Maharashtra, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Matang (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Pune who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Pune do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Pune, Maharashtra, India has a population of 9,429,400.

We estimate Pune has 103,723 people who might know Jesus, 114,410 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,211,267 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Pune, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
